inscription:
Verso, in pencil in unknown hand: Ramos Martinez / Procession of Women

Verso, coated silver paper label affixed to substrate: M. Flax, Inc. / 2414 West 7th Street / Los Angeles, California (This label references a retail art supply store founded by Meyer Flax in 1931; later renamed "Flax Pen to Paper")
medium: Tempera and pastel on heavy cardboard
provenance: Putnam Dana McMillan, Minneapolis and Santa Barbara, Calif., (until d. 1961); bequeathed to MIA , 1961 (accessioned 1984).
signed: Signed in orange-red tempera, LLC: Ramos Martinez (signature underscored)
title: Las vendedoras de flores
